original: AB, Sv tidskr.förl.AB, styr.suppl AB Sthlms brygg, styr.led Sv tidn.utg.frn 26—35, ordf i dess östg.kr 21—28, ordf Sv nät ungd.frb 31— 32, led allm valm.frbs överstyr o vkst utsk, ordf sv högerpress frn 32—40. Polit o ekon studieres Engl 14, 20, 22, 35, Holl 15, Frankr 24, 35, Tyskl, Schweiz, Finl mfl länd. Av trycket: Oppositionen o ministeransvarighe-ten, pari strömn i sv polit 1809—40 (17), Sv ind.probl i krigstid (39), tidskr.upps mm. Utg Sv tidskr 31—32. RNO, RVO. °ANDERSON, Johan, Grosshandlare, Borås, f Varnum 16/9 67. Gr 92 tills m brod Bröd Andersons Herrkläder AB Borås, AB 30, vkst dir där. Fd led dräts.kamm o tax.nmd.
translated:
AB - Limited company
Sv tidskr.förl.AB - Publishing company AB
styr.suppl AB Sthlms brygg - Board member substitute at AB Stockholm Brewery
styr.led Sv tidn.utg.frn 26—35 - Board member of Swedish Newspaper Publishing from 1926 to 1935
ordf i dess östg.kr 21—28 - Chairman of its East Department from 1921 to 1928
ordf Sv nät ungd.frb 31—32 - Chairman of the Swedish Youth Network from 1931 to 1932
led allm valm.frbs överstyr o vkst utsk - Member of the Public Election Committee's Oversight and Growth Committee
ordf sv högerpress frn 32—40 - Chairman of the Swedish Right Press from 1932 to 1940
Polit o ekon studieres Engl 14, 20, 22, 35, Holl 15, Frankr 24, 35, Tyskl, Schweiz, Finl mfl länd - Studied politics and economics in England in 1914, 1920, 1922, and 1935, in Holland in 1915, in France in 1924 and 1935, in Germany, Switzerland, Finland, and other countries
Av trycket - Published works: Oppositionen o ministeransvarighet-en, pari strömn i sv polit 1809—40 (17), Sv ind.probl i krigstid (39), tidskr.upps mm - Published articles: Opposition and ministerial responsibility, the parallel streams in Swedish politics 1809—1940 (17), Swedish industrial problems during wartime (39), miscellaneous journal essays
Utg Sv tidskr 31—32 - Published in the Swedish Journal from 1931 to 1932
RNO, RVO - Royal Order of the North Star, Royal Order of Vasa
°ANDERSON, Johan, Grosshandlare, Borås, f Varnum 16/9 67 - Johan Anderson, Merchant, Borås, born in Varnum on September 16, 1867
Gr 92 tills m brod Bröd Andersons Herrkläder AB Borås, AB 30, vkst dir där - Partnered in 1892 with his brother at Bröd Andersons Herrkläder AB Borås, became director there in 1930
Fd led dräts.kamm o tax.nmd - Former member of the finance committee and tax board

memberOf.name: AB Sthlms brygg - Stockholm Brewery AB
Sv nät ungd.frb - Swedish Youth Network

hasAward.name: RNO - Royal Order of the North Star

career.workplace: Public Election Committee's Oversight and Growth Committee
